title: @KateyKhaos; Gentleman Gnar
body: IT'S THE CUTEST FUCKING THING EVER!!!!!! LITERALLY MY REACTION WAS THE SAME AS THE GIRL FROM "DESPICABLE ME"; IT'S SO FLUFFY!!! I'M GONNA DIE!!!   HE'S CUTER THAN FUCKING STITCH! (Oooooooh, Alien Invader Gnar anyone??)  BUT SERIOUSLY GREAT WORK SKINS TEAM!!!!!!

replies.body: As much as I'd love to know that The Doctor can also speak Ancient Yordle thanks to the TARDIS language matrix by having him do the voice over for Gnar, i'm happy with it as is.  And besides, the British aren't the only ones that can dapper up and be a gentleman.
Haha, isn't he cute?! I love this dude!
Is Gentleman Gnar the only skin, save Tahm's release skin, that is coming out this patch? Can I take your silence for a yes?
He's adorable!  The pocket-watch boomerang is what really sells it for me, though i will say it took me a few looks to KNOW what it is as it's a little blurry while spinning.

Can think of many other champs much older than that 90% LCS pick/ban overloaded cc-train-tank-that-gets-to-skip-out-on-the-weak-laning-phase that haven't had any new skins in a very long time and could use it more.

{{champion:238}} {{champion:114}} {{champion:11}} for starters.

Zed is "Harder" to make a skin for because the shadow animations need to match it to a degree, and it's "more difficult" (i know the community can come up with 10,000 ideas) to find a good thematic he fits into that really changes characters model from what it is.

Fiora is waiting on her rework, once that is done she'll be in contention for a new one.

Master Yi.... F*ck him.
If only the balance team was as good as the skins team.....
I love how he looks like a dressed-up Mogwai.
Nothing is as cute as Stitch, but this is a close second
